title: Verify Apple wallet registration response successfully- POST request
Verify Apple wallet latest pass info successfully retrived -GET requests
Verify Apple wallet latest pass info successfully retrived -GET requests
Verify Invalidate pass-Delete request
Verify Apple wallet pass has been successfully deleted-Delete request
Verify only one pass is present when Fan with same iPhone -Create TDC NGE pass and then create MLB NGE pass
Verify only one pass is present when Fan with same iPhone -Create MLB pass and then create TDC pass
custom_preconds: Same user with same device (iPhone) using same ticket
custom_steps:
1 Create an apple pass using BP app
2. Verify the successful registration details in wallet DB
3. Create an apple pass for the same event from TDC sandbox using same device
4 Verify the successful registration details in wallet DB
This should modify the existing registration details from step 1
with latest registration
5. Verify the pass on the device ( Apple Wallet)
custom_expected:
1. Apple pass should be created and added to device wallet
2. Verify the pass registration details on Wallet DB
	Registration, pass, device table
3. Apple pass (TDC) will be replaced in wallet with a MLB apple pass
4.Verify the pass registration details on Wallet DB to be modified with the new pass
	Registration, pass, device table
5. There should be only pass exists on wallet ( the lasted registered pass)

title: Verify only one pass is present when Fan with same iPhone -Create TDC pass and then create MLB pass
custom_preconds: Same user with same device (iPhone) using same ticket
custom_steps:
1 Create an apple pass from TDC sandbox
https://mpvsb.tickets.com/?orgId=48671&agency=MLB_MPV&eventId=9673
2. Verify the successful registration details in wallet DB
3. Create an apple pass for the same event from BP app using same device
4 Verify the successful registration details in wallet DB
This should modify the existing registration details from step 1
with latest registration
5. Verify the pass on the device ( Apple Wallet)
custom_expected:
1. Apple pass should be created and added to device wallet
2. Verify the pass registration details on Wallet DB
	Registration, pass, device table
3. Apple pass (TDC) will be replaced in wallet with a MLB apple pass
4.Verify the pass registration details on Wallet DB to be modified with the new pass
	Registration, pass, device table
5. There should be only pass exists on wallet ( the lasted registered pass)

title: Verify only one pass is present when Fan with Different iPhone -Create MLB pass and then create TDC pass
custom_preconds: Same user with different devices (iPhone) using same ticket
custom_steps:
1 Create an apple pass using BP app
2. Verify the successful registration details in wallet DB
3. Create an apple pass from TDC sandbox (using same ticket with different device)
https://mpvsb.tickets.com/?orgId=48671&agency=MLB_MPV&eventId=9673
4 Verify the successful registration details in wallet DB
This should add a new registration details for different device
with latest registration
5. Verify the pass on the device ( Apple Wallet)
custom_expected:
1. Apple pass should be created and added to device wallet
2. Verify the pass registration details on Wallet DB
	Registration, pass, device table
3. Apple pass (TDC) will be replaced in wallet with a MLB apple pass
4.Verify the pass registration details on Wallet DB to be added with the new pass
	Registration, pass, device table
5. There should be two passes exists on wallet ( the lasted registered pass)

title: Verify the pass details created by MLB-Parking pass
custom_steps:
1. Create pass from BP (MLB pass)
2. Verify the pass details in wallet DB pass table is in below format
TDC format( inventory):  clientId.attendingPatronId.eventId.barcode
custom_expected:
1. Apple pass should be created
2. pass should matched with the specified format

title: Verify the pass details created from TDC sandbox
custom_steps:
1. Create pass from TDC end
2. Verify the pass details in wallet DB pass table is in below formart
TDC format( inventory):  clientId.attendingPatronId.eventId.sectionId.row.seat
custom_expected:
1. Apple pass should be created
2. pass should matched with the specified format

title: Verify TDC Applepass dateTime auto update for an existing pass when there is a stats change
custom_preconds: Fan with a TDC ticket and iphone
custom_steps:
1. Create a Apple pass from TDC end
https://mpvsb.tickets.com/?orgId=48671&agency=MLB_MPV&eventId=9751
2. Verify the ERIS log for the pass details ( search by UID)
https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/viewer?authuser=0&project=mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-e9b7&minLogLevel=0&expandAll=true&timestamp=2021-04-01T15:31:38.364000000Z&customFacets=&limitCustomFacetWidth=true&dateRangeStart=2021-04-01T14:31:38.615Z&interval=PT1H&scrollTimestamp=2021-04-01T15:31:30.028862567Z&dateRangeEnd=2021-04-01T15:31:38.615Z&advancedFilter=resource.type%3D%22k8s_container%22%0Aresource.labels.project_id%3D%22mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-e9b7%22%0Aresource.labels.location%3D%22us-east4%22%0Aresource.labels.cluster_name%3D%22mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-cluster2%22%0Aresource.labels.namespace_name%3D%22jx-qa-tix-eris-wallet-service%22%0Alabels.k8s-pod%2Fapp%3D%22jx-eris-wallet%22%0Alabels.k8s-pod%2Fdraft%3D%22draft-app%22%20severity%3E%3DDEFAULT
3.Verify the EIRS registration in Postgress DB (walletdb)
in device, pass and registration field
4.Send a request to the "schedules" team to make a change to "dateTime" for the same event( MLB pass event)
5.Once change is in stats verify the log
GCP logs-
resource.type="k8s_container"
resource.labels.project_id="mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-e9b7"
resource.labels.location="us-east4"
resource.labels.cluster_name="mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-cluster2"
resource.labels.namespace_name="jx-qa-tix-stats-change-processor"
labels.k8s-pod/app="jx-tix-stats-change-processor" severity>=DEFAULT
6. Verify the Eris /invalidate was triggered for the same event
7. Verify the apple pass on the Wallet has been updated with the new dateTime
custom_expected:
1. Apple pass should be created successfully 
2.Apple pass registration details should be in the log
3.Apple pass details should be recorded into walletdb database
4.Request should be fulfill by schedules team
5.Change should see in the log ( with in 6.30 mins)
6. Log should show the invalidate
7. Wallet pass being updated with the new dateTime

title: Verify when unverified fan createsTDC pass  from game event, his/her account being verified at MLB
custom_preconds:
user with unverified ticketing account
User should have tickets on the account
Before run test- Account should not be linked (boxo- ticket-accounts) or email should not be verified ("verified": false)
custom_steps:
1. User create apple pass from the TDC sandbox
2. Verify the pass details in Wallet DB ( Registration, pass and device tables)
3. Verify the account links and email verification flag for the account
custom_expected:
1. Pass should be created successfully.
2. Registration information should be stored in Wallet DB 
3. Account should be linked in boxo- ticket-accounts and email should be verified "verified": true.

title: Verify when unverified fan just purchase a ticket in TDC, his/her account is not verified at MLB
Verify when unverified fan createsTDC pass  from parking event, his/her account being verified at MLB
custom_preconds:
user with unverified ticketing account
User should have tickets on the account
Before run test- Account should not be linked (boxo- ticket-accounts) or email should not be verified ("verified": false)
custom_steps:
1. User create apple pass ( Parking pass) from the TDC sandbox
2. Verify the pass details in Wallet DB ( Registration, pass and device tables)
3. Verify the account links and email verification flag for the account
4. Verify Linked Type is "tdcPassRegister"
5.Spring Venue is also linked
custom_expected:
1. Pass should be created successfully.
2. Registration information should be stored in Wallet DB 
3. Account should be linked in boxo- ticket-accounts and email should be verified "verified": true.
